p: Sinus bradycardia was detected in 35% of the HFRS patients; it appeared on day 9.5 (4–26) of illness and was mostly of short duration. Thirty-five percent of HFRS patients reported acute transient myopia; it appeared on day 5 (2–12) of illness and lasted for 2 (1–33) days. Other signs and symptoms shown in Table 2 were detected or reported in ≤30% of patients with HFRS.
